title: Missile kills at least 52 at crowded Ukrainian train station - The Associated Press
content:
1. Missile kills at least 52 at crowded Ukrainian train station  The Associated Press
  2. Russia attack on train station in eastern Kramatorsk leaves dozens dead, officials say  Fox News
  3. Missile Strike On Train Station In Eastern Ukraine City  NBC News
  4. Russia invades Ukraine: Live updates  CNN
  5. Johnson condemns attack on Ukraine train station: 'Russia will not go unpunished'  The Independent

description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) â€” A missile hit a train station in eastern Ukraine where thousands had gathered Friday, killing at least 52 and wounding dozens more in an attack on a crowd of mostly women and children trying to flee a new, looming Russian offensive , Ukrainian authorities said.
